attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To know Poorhouse is to love him, and for too long now 7 million Londoners have been deprived of the privilege of counting him amongst their own.

So please join me in enticing/cajoling/brainwashing Poorhouse and together we can make London a better place to live.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
